summary: Switzerland  is a small country in Western Europe.
full_text:
Didier Burkhalter  is a Swiss politician of FDP.The Liberals. He was elected as member of the Swiss Federal Council on 16 September 2009, and succeeded Pascal Couchepin on 1 November 2009 when he became head of the Federal Department of Home Affairs . Since 1 January 2012, he is head of the Department of Foreign Affairs. In the year 2014 he was President of the Swiss Confederation.
^ "Burkhalter wird Aussen-, Berset Innenminister". Tages-Anzeiger . 2011-12-16. Retrieved 2011-12-16.
title: Didier Burkhalter
